mapper.insert: insert into zr_tbl_reply(bno, reply, replyer) values(#{bno}, #{reply}, #{replyer})
mapper.update: update zr_tbl_reply set reply = #{reply}, updatedate = now() where rno = #{rno}
mapper.select: select rno, bno, reply, replyer, replyDate, updatedate from zr_tbl_reply where bno = #{bno} order by rno asc
